verbose_text: For optogenetic studies, male and female mice were obtained by crossing a floxed Halorhodopsin (NpHR)-EYFP (JAX # 014539) mouse with a mouse that contains a PV directed Cre driver (PV-Cre, JAX # 008069) to obtain animals that express the eNpHR3.0 fusion protein in all PV-interneurons, as well as their control littermates that did not express the protein.
